title: Darrington, Washington
summary: Darrington is a town in Snohomish County, Washington, United States. It is located in a North Cascades mountain valley formed by the Sauk and North Fork Stillaguamish rivers. Darrington is connected to nearby areas by State Route 530, which runs along the two rivers towards the city of Arlington, located 30 miles (48Â km) to the west, and Rockport. It had a population of 1,347 at the 2010 census.
